name: Pogo Penny
description:
Pogo Pennys big adventure, the ultimate platformer game that will blow you away.
This game got it all, find the hidden warps, power ups and cheats.
Defeat the orcs and all enemies along the way and beat the bosses in each castle.

100 unique and well crafted levels filled with action packed gaming for all ages to play!
Pogo Penny is trulu just amazing and will keep you busy for days and weeks.

No ads, no in app purchases at all, just get the game and show the enemies that Pogo Penny is a tough chick that
can and will defeat em all at any cost!
Classig gaming controll where you can take Penny where ever you like, jump, smash blocks, jump on enemies, collect shields and fireballs to complete the levels.

Not only does this game have tons of great quality levels and enemies and to top it all up, 100 levels with boss fights,
you also get 5 different worlds to play with new stuff happening in each world, new enemies will appear both on land,
under water and in the sky.

Do not miss Pogo Pennys awesome adventure, if there is one game you should not miss, this is it!

Please rate the game to keep getting free lifetime updates!
